# Introduction

Welcome to the exciting realm of Digital Agriculture! In this innovative course, we delve into the intersection of cutting-edge technologies and traditional farming practices. Explore how data analytics, sensor technologies, and precision farming methods revolutionize animal management, resource optimization, and decision-making processes. Gain insights into the transformative potential of digital tools in enhancing agricultural sustainability and productivity. Whether you're an early-stage dairy professional or a tech enthusiast, join us on a journey to harness the power of digital advancements for a smarter and more efficient future in agriculture.

# Learning goals

1.  Introduction to the 'Data Science Applications in Agriculture' course

2.  Get to know the team and explore the project topic

3.  Get to know python

4.  Submit programming assignment by Monday 12 pm through Dodona 


Please take a moment to fill in this forms so we can tailor the course to your needs: [Pre-course questionnaire](https://forms.office.com/r/bDEBaU5fN1)
